name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Margherita pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 500°F (260°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Tear mozzarella and place it on top.
Bake for 7-10 minutes until crust is golden.
Add fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil before serving.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Creamy spaghetti carbonara with pancetta and parmesan.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs and parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain spaghetti, reserving some pasta water.
Toss spaghetti with pancetta, then remove from heat.
Quickly mix in egg and cheese mixture, adding reserved water to create a creamy sauce.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Simple Caprese salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into even rounds.
Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate, alternating them.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.

name: Stracciatella (Italian Wedding Soup)
